Articles.Content:
Is there any way to limit how fast a rover can go (max speed) without using mods? Something like editing the craft file.

If there isn't a speed limiter, there should be IMO.

The wheels of the rovers break when you go above a certain speed, which is 60 m/s for the fastest one, this could be considered a speed limit.

Edited May 25, 2013 by Pursuedtank
I don't think there is a speed limit. It all is determined by (don't take my word on this) the mass and how powerful the wheels you are using.
